item.description:
The Center of Light presents Master Teacher Father Peter Bowes

If you have a longing for a really meaningful spiritual life, you may find yourself feeling attracted to idea of mysticism. But what does it really mean? The word "mystical" refers to "a spiritual reality not apparent to the senses or intelligence ... stemming from direct communion with God." This means that a person who is a mystic is in a deep love relationship with God at the center of his or her own being. There, deep in that holy place within, a mystic finds complete peace, joy, light, and love. Come to this seminar to learn the secrets of going deeper and find out what your soul needs.

Bring a friend for free!

Lunch is included.

group.name: Meditation & Inner Spirituality Group - New Haven

item.name: Mysticism and the Mystical Life - Seminar with a Master Teacher
